verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, Thou almighty King, Help us Thy Name to sing, help us to praise! Father all glorious, o’er all victorious, Come and reign over us, Ancient of Days!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, Thou incarnate Word, Gird on Thy mighty sword, our prayer attend! Come, and Thy people bless, and give Thy Word success, Spirit of holiness, on us descend!{/lang-eng}
